languages.text: Херетеки уподобляются механическому рою, принося жертвы Орудию. Они счастливы, пока доволен их железный идол, а он шепчет им секреты создания новых темных механизмов.

The hereteks have become akin to a mechanical swarm, offering more and more sacrifices to the Engine. Their existence is blissful for as long as their metallic idol remains content. In return, the machine whispers to them secrets to the creation of new sinister mechanisms.
languages.original_text: Херетеки уподобляются механическому рою, принося жертвы Орудию. Они счастливы, пока доволен их железный идол, а он шепчет им секреты создания новых темных механизмов.

traits.locale_text: The hereteks have become akin to a mechanical swarm, offering more and more sacrifices to the Engine. Their existence is blissful for as long as their metallic idol remains content. In return, the machine whispers to them secrets to the creation of new sinister mechanisms.
Bloody executions at the Engine's hands make all of Kiava Gamma tremble.

The hereteks have become akin to a mechanical swarm, offering more and more sacrifices to the Engine. Their existence is blissful for as long as their metallic idol remains content. In return, the machine whispers to them secrets to the creation of new sinister mechanisms.
Bloody executions at the hands of the Engine make all of Kiava Gamma tremble.

languages.text: Les héréteks offrent toujours plus de sacrifices à la Machine et s'apparentent désormais à un essaim d'automates. Tant que leur idole de métal est satisfaite, leur existence baigne dans la félicité. En retour, elle leur souffle les secrets de la création de nouveaux mécanismes sinistres.
languages.original_text: The hereteks have become akin to a mechanical swarm, offering more and more sacrifices to the Engine. Their existence is blissful for as long as their metallic idol remains content. In return, the machine whispers to them secrets to the creation of new sinister mechanisms.

traits.locale_text: Les héréteks offrent toujours plus de sacrifices à la Machine et s'apparentent désormais à un essaim d'automates. Tant que leur idole de métal est satisfaite, leur existence baigne dans la félicité. En retour, elle leur souffle les secrets de la création de nouveaux mécanismes sinistres.

languages.text: 異端技術はもはや機械の群れのようになり、エンジンにどんどん生贄を捧げていく。金属の偶像が満足する限り、彼らにとっては至福の時である。その見返りとして、機械は新たな不吉なメカニズムを生み出すための秘密を彼らにささやく。
languages.original_text: The hereteks have become akin to a mechanical swarm, offering more and more sacrifices to the Engine. Their existence is blissful for as long as their metallic idol remains content. In return, the machine whispers to them secrets to the creation of new sinister mechanisms.

traits.locale_text: 異端技術はもはや機械の群れのようになり、エンジンにどんどん生贄を捧げていく。金属の偶像が満足する限り、彼らにとっては至福の時である。その見返りとして、機械は新たな不吉なメカニズムを生み出すための秘密を彼らにささやく。

languages.text: 这些异教信徒变成了某种类似于机械蜂群的东西，为邪恶引擎带来越来越多的祭品。只要他们的金属之神对他们的侍奉感到满意，他们心中就会充满至福。作为回报，邪恶引擎会向他们低语各种各样的秘密，指引他们制造新的邪恶机械。
languages.original_text: The hereteks have become akin to a mechanical swarm, offering more and more sacrifices to the Engine. Their existence is blissful for as long as their metallic idol remains content. In return, the machine whispers to them secrets to the creation of new sinister mechanisms.

traits.locale_text: 这些异教信徒变成了某种类似于机械蜂群的东西，为邪恶引擎带来越来越多的祭品。只要他们的金属之神对他们的侍奉感到满意，他们心中就会充满至福。作为回报，邪恶引擎会向他们低语各种各样的秘密，指引他们制造新的邪恶机械。

languages.text: Los hereteks se han convertido en una especie de enjambre mecánico que ofrece más y más sacrificios al motor. Su existencia es pletórica, al menos mientras su ídolo metálico esté satisfecho. A cambio, la máquina les susurra secretos sobe la creación de nuevos y siniestros mecanismos.
languages.original_text: The hereteks have become akin to a mechanical swarm, offering more and more sacrifices to the Engine. Their existence is blissful for as long as their metallic idol remains content. In return, the machine whispers to them secrets to the creation of new sinister mechanisms.

traits.locale_text: Los hereteks se han convertido en una especie de enjambre mecánico que ofrece más y más sacrificios al motor. Su existencia es pletórica, al menos mientras su ídolo metálico esté satisfecho. A cambio, la máquina les susurra secretos sobe la creación de nuevos y siniestros mecanismos.

languages.text: Die Häretekten gleichen inzwischen einem mechanischen Schwarm, sie bieten der Maschine mehr und mehr Opfer dar. Sie führen eine glückselige Existenz, so lange ihr metallischer Götze zufrieden ist. Im Gegenzug flüstert die Maschine ihnen Geheimnisse zu, wie sich neue dunkle Mechanismen herstellen lassen.
languages.original_text: The hereteks have become akin to a mechanical swarm, offering more and more sacrifices to the Engine. Their existence is blissful for as long as their metallic idol remains content. In return, the machine whispers to them secrets to the creation of new sinister mechanisms.

traits.locale_text: Die Häretekten gleichen inzwischen einem mechanischen Schwarm, sie bieten der Maschine mehr und mehr Opfer dar. Sie führen eine glückselige Existenz, so lange ihr metallischer Götze zufrieden ist. Im Gegenzug flüstert die Maschine ihnen Geheimnisse zu, wie sich neue dunkle Mechanismen herstellen lassen.

languages.text: Tekâfirler, Motor'a durmaksızın kurban sunan mekanik bir sürü hâline geliyor. Metalik mabutları hoşnut kaldığı sürece varoluşları mutluluk içinde geçiyor. Karşılığında, makine onlara yeni ve şeytani mekanizmaların yaratılış sırlarını fısıldıyor.
languages.original_text: The hereteks have become akin to a mechanical swarm, offering more and more sacrifices to the Engine. Their existence is blissful for as long as their metallic idol remains content. In return, the machine whispers to them secrets to the creation of new sinister mechanisms.
